name: Fetch Quest (OllieSAE, BargainBin2, cian_e)
description:
It’s a doggy play date! 

Your owner has taken you out for some exercise- playing fetch, to be precise! As the day goes by, you’ll explore the forested landscape of this planet, retrieving the ball your owner throws for you.

The ball sometimes gets itself stuck in strange places, but that’s alright! You’ve got a couple of ‘slimy’ tricks up your paw to ensure that you’ll always get the ball back to your owner! 

Controls:
Move Left - A or Left arrow
Move Right - D or Right Arrow
Jump - Space
Jump Down - Hold S or hold Down arrow, and press Space
Pick up Ball - Collide with it
Return Ball - Collide with Owner after picking up the ball
Pause - Esc

While you're here, we'd really appreciate (and in fact encourage) you to take this survey once you've played our game, as it's currently in development. We're looking for as much feedback as possible!

Survey link: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSeAig_4hUIT6er2EOdFMD20zPlK74PNsr0HXOiJ...

Credits:

Cian E.
Ollie V.
